data.name: Roserade
data.flavorText: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.

attacks.name: Poisonous Whip
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Assassin's Rose
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack also does 60 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Chandelure
data.flavorText: This Pokémon haunts dilapidated mansions. It sways its arms to hypnotize opponents with the ominous dancing of its flames.

abilities.name: Mountain Roasting
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.

data.name: Hisuian Arcanine
data.flavorText: Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a deceptively merry chase as it all but dances around them.

attacks.name: Very Vulnerable
attacks.text: If you have no cards in your hand, this attack does 150 more damage.

data.name: Castform
data.flavorText: Its form changes depending on the weather. The rougher conditions get, the rougher Castform's disposition!

abilities.name: Weather Reading
abilities.text: If you have 8 or more Stadium cards in your discard pile, ignore all Energy in this Pokémon's attack costs.

attacks.name: Weather Force
attacks.text: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

data.name: Orbeetle V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Strafe
attacks.text: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mysterious Wave
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Centiskorch VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: G-Max Centiferno
attacks.text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you did any damage with this attack, you may attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

data.name: Pikachu VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: G-Max Volt Tackle
attacks.text: You may discard all Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 150 more damage.

data.name: Gallade V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Rising Sword
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Prize card you have taken.

attacks.name: Buster Swing
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

data.name: Crobat V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Dark Asset
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. You can't use more than 1 Dark Asset Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Venomous Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.name: Boss's Orders
rules: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

data.name: Nessa
rules: Put up to 4 in any combination of Water Pokémon and Water Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

data.name: Mew VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Cross Fusion Strike
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your Benched Fusion Strike Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

attacks.name: Max Miracle
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Banette
data.flavorText: Resentment at being cast off made it spring into being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.

attacks.name: Resolute Spite
attacks.text: Put up to 7 damage counters on this Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter you placed in this way.

attacks.name: Eerie Light
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

data.name: Snorlax
data.flavorText: This glutton appears in villages without warning and devours the entirety of their rice granaries—such occurrences have long been counted among the gravest of disasters.

abilities.name: Unfazed Fat
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of attacks from your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon. (Damage is not an effect.)

attacks.name: Thumping Snore
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Asleep. During Pokémon Checkup, flip 2 coins instead of 1. If either of them is tails, this Pokémon is still Asleep.

data.name: Eternatus V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Power Accelerator
attacks.text: You may attach a Darkness Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dynamax Cannon
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon VMAX, this attack does 120 more damage.

data.name: Opal
rules: Flip 2 coins. Search your deck for a number of cards up to the number of heads, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

data.name: Charizard
data.flavorText: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

abilities.name: Battle Sense
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Discard the other cards.

attacks.name: Royal Blaze
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Leon card in your discard pile.

data.name: Spiritomb
data.flavorText: It lays curses by thinking wicked thoughts. Writings tell that this Pokémon was born out of the assembly of five score and eight malevolent spirits.

abilities.name: Cursed Message
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Chain of Spirits
attacks.text: This attack does 60 more damage for each Spiritomb in your discard pile.

data.name: Orbeetle VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Eerie Beam
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: G-Max Wave
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Pikachu V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Lightning Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

data.name: Enamorus V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Guardian of Love
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to each of your Pokémon that has any Psychic Energy attached, except any Enamorus V.

attacks.name: Blossom Tail
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

data.name: Cook
rules: Heal 70 damage from your Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

data.name: Kabu
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards. If your Active Pokémon is your only Pokémon in play, draw 8 cards instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

data.name: Pikachu VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: G-Max Volt Tackle
attacks.text: You may discard all Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 150 more damage.

data.name: Parasect
data.flavorText: Mushroom-lacking specimens of this Pokémon lie unmoving in the forest, lending credence to the hypothesis that the large mushroom is in control of Parasect's actions.

abilities.name: Lethargy Spores
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may make both Active Pokémon Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

data.name: Pikachu
data.flavorText: Possesses cheek sacs in which it stores electricity. This clever forest-dweller roasts tough berries with an electric shock before consuming them.

abilities.name: Pika Dash
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Whimsy Tackle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.name: Gengar
data.flavorText: Possesses potential victims' shadows in an effort to steal away the victims' lives. If your shadow begins to laugh, you must take hold of a protective charm posthaste!

abilities.name: Netherworld Gate
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in your discard pile, you may put it onto your Bench. If you do, put 3 damage counters on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Screaming Circle
attacks.text: Put 2 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

data.name: Centiskorch V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Radiating Heat
attacks.text: You may discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.name: Eternatus VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Eternal Zone
abilities.text: If all of your Pokémon in play are Darkness type, you can have up to 8 Pokémon on your Bench, and you can't put non-Darkness Pokémon into play. (If this Ability stops working, discard Pokémon from your Bench until you have 5.)

attacks.name: Dread End
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Darkness Pokémon in play.

data.name: Adventurer's Discovery
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 Pokémon V, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.
